settings.text: We are a U.S. owned and based manufacturer and distributor of vinyl decals and labels. Originally developed as a solution for golfers who want a long-lasting option for putting contact information on their clubs, our products have a multitude of uses for individuals, families, businesses and organizations.

Our labels last. ID Decals and labels are made from high-quality material designed for long-term, outdoor use. They will not fade, scuff, or come off before you remove them. During the decal production process, we add a textured matte lamination that protects the vinyl label for added endurance against wear-and-tear, moisture, cleaners, UV exposure, and frequent, heavy-duty use. They are designed for hard surfaces in rough conditions.

The differences between ID Decals and other labels for your daycare items, equipment and gear are quality and convenience. Peel and stick them, and then continue using and caring for your prized possessions. Over time, you will be very satisfied that the appearance and adhesive will be as good as new.
